alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Knox (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 1:54AM CDT until April 19 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Knox County in northeastern Nebraska... West central Cedar County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 154 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bloomfield, or 19 miles southwest of Lewis And Clark State Recreation Area, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Bloomfield, Crofton, Weigand Marina and Santee Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Omaha.
